# Softwares
* [Sage Manifold](https://sagemanifolds.obspm.fr/)
* [GraviPy](https://pypi.org/project/GraviPy/)
* [EinsteinPy - Making Einstein possible in Python](https://docs.einsteinpy.org/en/stable/)
* [RicciPy - A tensor algebra calculator for General Relativity](https://github.com/yqiuu/tensor-analysis)
* [tensor-analysis - symbolic tool to do tensor analysis in general relativity](https://github.com/yqiuu/tensor-analysis)
* [SymPy - Python library for symbolic mathematics](https://www.sympy.org/pt/index.html)



# Online Resources
* [EinsteinPy - Making Einstein possible in Python](https://docs.einsteinpy.org/en/stable/index.html)
* [binder - EsinteinPy](https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/einsteinpy/einsteinpy/master?filepath=index.ipynb)
* [Symbolic and Numerical Analysis in General Relativity with Open Source Computer Algebra Systems](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.09738.pdf)
* [EinsteinPy Release 0.2.1](https://readthedocs.org/projects/einsteinpy-project/downloads/pdf/stable/)
* [Sympy - Differential Geometry](https://docs.sympy.org/latest/modules/diffgeom.html)
* [Sympy - tensor modules](https://docs.sympy.org/latest/modules/tensor/tensor.html)
* [Jupyter notebooks examples on General Relativity](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/sympy/sympy/tree/master/examples/notebooks/)
* [Krastanov Blog - Schwarzschild Solution](https://krastanov.wordpress.com/2012/07/22/the-schwarzschild-solution/)
